nodes.label: Finiteness (C5)
nodes.description: The universe U has finitely many elements.

nodes.label: Connectivity (C1)
nodes.description: Every pair of perspectives shares a non-empty overlap.

nodes.label: Nontriviality (C3)
nodes.description: Perspectives have dimension >= 1.

nodes.label: Closure (C4)
nodes.description: Adjacency structure is closed under composition.

nodes.label: Partiality (P1)
nodes.description: No perspective sees all of U. Defect and hidden sectors exist.

nodes.label: Crystal existence (C2)
nodes.description: There exists a maximal orthonormal basis (the Crystal).

nodes.label: Perfect orthogonality
nodes.description: Crystal basis vectors are perfectly orthogonal.

nodes.label: Finite access (P3)
nodes.description: dim(V_pi) < infinity for every perspective.

nodes.label: Algebraic completeness (T0)
nodes.description: Transition maps form a complete algebraic structure.

nodes.label: Directed time (T1)
nodes.description: Perspective sequences are directed (past to future).

nodes.label: Crystallization tendency
nodes.description: The system evolves toward crystalline order via gradient flow.

nodes.label: Completeness Principle (CCP)
nodes.description: The Crystal contains all structure consistent with its axioms. Perfection = maximal consistency.

nodes.label: Frobenius theorem
nodes.description: Only R, C, H, O are finite-dimensional associative division algebras over R.

nodes.label: Hurwitz theorem
nodes.description: Only R, C, H, O are normed division algebras. Dimensions 1, 2, 4, 8.

nodes.label: Radon-Hurwitz theorem
nodes.description: rho(n) gives max linearly independent vector fields on S^(n-1). rho(7) = 1 < 4.

nodes.label: First Fundamental Theorem (FFT)
nodes.description: SO(m) x SO(n) invariants on M(m,n) generated by entries of A^T A (Weyl, Procesi).

nodes.label: Schur's lemma
nodes.description: Irreducible representation endomorphisms are scalar. Forces democratic coupling.

nodes.label: IRA-06: Crystallization = SSB
nodes.description: The mathematical crystallization process IS physical spontaneous symmetry breaking. Weinberg-forced: all 8 SSB properties present.

nodes.label: IRA-07: Adjacency = time
nodes.description: Directed perspective sequences ARE physical time evolution. Weinberg-forced: all 6 time properties present.

nodes.label: No zero divisors
nodes.description: T_1 compose T_2 != 0 for non-zero transitions.

nodes.label: Transition invertibility
nodes.description: Every transition T has inverse T^(-1).

nodes.label: Division algebra structure
nodes.description: Transitions form a division algebra over F. By Frobenius: D in {R, C, H, O}.

nodes.label: F = C (complex field)
nodes.description: Directed time forces the field to be C (complex numbers).

nodes.label: n_d = 4 (spacetime dim)
nodes.description: Maximum associative division algebra dimension is 4 (quaternions H).

nodes.label: n_c = 11 (crystal dim)
nodes.description: n_c = Im(C) + Im(H) + Im(O) = 1 + 3 + 7 = 11. All imaginary dimensions.

nodes.label: SO(11) breaking chain
nodes.description: SO(11) -> SO(4) x SO(7) -> SO(4) x G_2 -> SO(4) x SU(3). 28+7+6 = 41 Goldstones.

nodes.label: SM gauge group: U(1) x SU(2) x SU(3)
nodes.description: Pipeline 121 -> 55 -> 18 -> 12. Adjoint filtering on End(V).

nodes.label: Hilbert space structure
nodes.description: V_pi is automatically a finite-dimensional Hilbert space over C.

nodes.label: Unitary evolution
nodes.description: T(s) = exp(-isH), H Hermitian. From content conservation + Stone's theorem.

nodes.label: Born rule: P(k) = |c_k|^2
nodes.description: Born rule from crystallization dynamics via martingale + optional stopping.

nodes.label: N_I = n_d^2 + n_c^2 = 137
nodes.description: Interface mode count: 16 + 121 = 137 modes. Interface strength s_I = 1/N_I.

nodes.label: Phi_6(n_c) = 111 EM channels
nodes.description: 6th cyclotomic polynomial at n_c: n_c^2 - n_c + 1 = 111.

nodes.label: Equal EM distribution
nodes.description: Tilt coupling distributes equally over 111 EM channels. From U(n_c) transitivity + Schur.

nodes.label: Alpha mechanism
nodes.description: Born-rule probability P = 1/N_I = 1/137 per mode at crystallization vertex.

nodes.label: Independent sectors (A3)
nodes.description: Dim 7 odd -> rho(7) = 1 < 4 -> no [4,7,7]-composition algebra. n_d^2 + n_c^2 = 137 DERIVED.

nodes.label: Quartic potential forced (B1)
nodes.description: FFT on Hom(R^4, R^7): all invariants even -> no cubic -> quartic is minimum.

nodes.label: 1/alpha(tree) = 137 + 4/111
nodes.description: Tree-level: 1/alpha = n_d^2 + n_c^2 + n_d/Phi_6(n_c) = 15211/111.

nodes.label: 1/alpha = 137.035999... (0.0002 ppm)
nodes.description: Dressed: tree + C_2 correction. C_2 = 24/11 [DERIVATION]. Two-loop: 0.0009 ppm (5.9 sigma). Three-loop (D_3=1 [CONJECTURE]): 0.0001 ppb (0.0006 sigma).

nodes.label: sin^2(theta_W) = 28/121
nodes.description: Tree-level Weinberg angle: n_d * Im(O) / n_c^2 = 4*7/121 = 28/121 = 0.23140.

nodes.label: sin^2(theta_W) dressed (3.75 ppm)
nodes.description: On-shell: cos(theta_W) = 171/194. One-loop dressing: 28/121 - alpha/(4*pi^2).

nodes.label: Omega_m = 63/200
nodes.description: Matter density from dual-channel HS equipartition: 63 dual-role generators out of 200 total.

nodes.label: 3 generations
nodes.description: Hom(H, R^7) = R^7 + Im(H) x R^7 = R^7 + 3*R^7. Three independent generation channels.

nodes.label: EWSB: Higgs = pNGB
nodes.description: (2,1)_{Y=1/2} doublet from tilt off-diagonal block. VEV gives W+,W-,Z massive, gamma massless.

nodes.label: Lorentz signature (1,3)
nodes.description: Herm(2,C) = R^(1,3). Observable algebra from H structure gives Minkowski signature.

nodes.label: QM from axioms (7 properties)
nodes.description: Complex Hilbert space, Born rule, unitarity, complex amplitudes, non-commutativity, uncertainty, quantization.

nodes.label: Einstein equations
nodes.description: From Lovelock's theorem + crystallization dynamics in 4D.

nodes.label: Yang-Mills mass gap
nodes.description: Glueball mass formula: m/sqrt(sigma) = n_d + J(J+1)/n_d + ... Base mass n_d=4.

nodes.label: DM mass = 5.11 GeV
nodes.description: Dark matter mass from SU(7) hidden sector structure. 49/9 ratio.

nodes.label: n_s = 193/200, r = 7/200
nodes.description: Hilltop inflation from crystallization potential on Gr(4,11).

chains.name: Fine Structure Constant (1/alpha)
chains.description: From CCP axioms through division algebras to 1/alpha = 137 + 4/111

chains.name: Weinberg Angle (sin^2 theta_W)
chains.description: From SO(11) breaking chain to sin^2(theta_W) = 28/121

chains.name: Matter Density (Omega_m)
chains.description: From division algebra dimensions to Omega_m = 63/200

chains.name: SM Gauge Group
chains.description: Pipeline 121 -> 55 -> 18 -> 12 deriving U(1) x SU(2) x SU(3)

chains.name: Quantum Mechanics from Axioms
chains.description: Deriving all 7 QM properties from perspective axioms
